sections.heading: Recording of maps and plats; preservation of originals9-253
sections.text: Recording of maps and plats; preservation of originalsA. The county recorder shall record the plats in a book to be kept for that purpose, and, when necessary, may reduce the scale of the plat, and upon each record in the book, shall endors
